trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Disponibiliza dados para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing"> </xref> eventos do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs class is used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectDisposing%2A> method to provide access to the business object instance after any data operations that are using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control and business object are performed, but before the business object is destroyed.
trans-unit.target: A classe de ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs é utilizada no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectDisposing%2A>método para fornecer acesso para a instância de objecto de negócio após as operações de dados que estão a utilizar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>objeto de controlo e comerciais são executadas, mas antes das empresas e o objeto é destruído.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectDisposing%2A>

trans-unit.source: The business object is accessed using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O objecto de negócio é acedido utilizando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A>

trans-unit.source: By adding a delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing> event, you can access any publicly exposed members of the business object to perform any final work or clean up.
trans-unit.target: Ao adicionar um delegado para processar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>evento, podem aceder a quaisquer membros expostos publicamente o objecto de negócio para realizar qualquer trabalho final ou limpar correr</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectDisposing%2A> method is not called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control, if the method that performs data operations is a `static` method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectDisposing%2A>método não é chamado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>controlar, se o método que executa operações de dados for uma `static` método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectDisposing%2A>

trans-unit.source: No business object instance is created when the method is static.
trans-unit.target: Nenhuma instância de objecto de negócio é criada quando o método é estático.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control exposes many events that you can handle to work with the underlying business object at various times in its lifecycle.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>controlo expõe muitos eventos que pode processar para trabalhar com o objecto de negócio subjacentes a horas variadas no respetivo ciclo de vida.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the events and the associated <xref:System.EventArgs> classes and event handler delegates.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte lista os eventos e associada <xref:System.EventArgs>classes e os delegados do processador de eventos.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Event|EventArgs|EventHandler| |-----------|---------------|------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>.
trans-unit.target: | Evento | EventArgs | EventHandler | |-----------|---------------|------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>

trans-unit.source: Occurs immediately before the instance of the business object is created.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated>.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre imediatamente antes de é criada a instância do objecto de negócio. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs immediately after the instance of the business object is created.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre imediatamente depois de criar a instância do objecto de negócio. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the data is retrieved.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting>.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre antes dos dados são obtidos. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occur before an insert, update, or delete operation is performed.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected>
trans-unit.target: Ocorre antes de uma insert, update ou de operação de eliminação é efetuada. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the data is retrieved.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted>.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre depois dos dados são obtidos. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occur after the insert, update, or delete operation is completed.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>.
trans-unit.target: Ocorrer após a inserção, atualização ou eliminação operação for concluída. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs before a business object is destroyed.|ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventHandler>|
trans-unit.target: Ocorre antes de um objecto de negócio é destruído. | ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventHandler>|</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs"></xref> class using the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs"> </xref> classe utilizando o objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: The business object with which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> interacts to perform data operations.
trans-unit.target: O objecto de negócio com o qual o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref> interage para efetuar operações de dados.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that represents the business object with which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> control performs data operations.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objecto que representa o objecto de negócio com o qual o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref> controlo executa operações de dados.

trans-unit.source: If the data operation methods (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateMethod%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A>) are instance methods, an instance of the business object is created before the method is executed.
trans-unit.target: Se os métodos de operação de dados (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateMethod%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A>) são os métodos de instância, uma instância do negócio objeto é criado antes do método é executado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateMethod%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can prevent the business object from being created for each call by saving the object in the ObjectInstance property in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Pode impedir o objecto de negócio que está a ser criada para cada chamada por guardar o objeto na propriedade ObjectInstance no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>processador de eventos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>

trans-unit.source: In subsequent <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating> events, you can retrieve the business object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: No subsequentes <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>eventos, pode obter o objeto de negócio do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>

trans-unit.source: The business object the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> uses to data operations; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, if <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> is passed to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O objecto de negócio a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref> utiliza para operações de dados; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, se <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> é passado para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs"> </xref>.
